mapper.select: SELECT /* edMbr.getEdMbrInfo */ MBR_ID , MBR_NO , MBR_NM , GEND_CD , FRG_CD , JUMIN_NO1 , AGE , TEL_NO1 , TEL_NO2 , TEL_NO3 , ZIP_CD , ADDR1 , ADDR2 , MBR_TP1 , MBR_TP2 , MBR_TP3 , MBR_TP4 , MBR_TP5 , MBR_TP6 , MRG_CD , EDU_CD , EDU02_CD , RLGN_CD , JOB_CD , FST_DRUG_CD , FST_DRUG , MAIN_DRUG_CD , MAIN_DRUG , FST_AGE , LST_AGE , USE_TERM , USE_FRQ_CD , USE_CAU_CD , USE_CAU_ETC , LAW_PBM_CD , LAW_PBM_ETC , CRE_ID , CRE_DT , UPD_ID , UPD_DT FROM ED_MBR WHERE MBR_NO = #{mbrNo}
